definitions.text: the act of making up your mind about something
examples: the burden of decision was his

definitions.text: a position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration
examples: a decision unfavorable to the opposition
his conclusion took the evidence into account

definitions.text: (boxing) a victory won on points when no knockout has occurred
examples: had little trouble in taking a unanimous decision over his opponent

definitions.text: the outcome of a game or contest
examples: the team dropped three decisions in a row

definitions.text: the trait of resoluteness as evidenced by firmness of character or purpose
